text: Answer: (c, d) Solution: (a) False. NAT causes routing tables to include less information. (b) False. NAT slows down packet handling; (c) True. NAT allows is to use a pool instead of dedicated IP which slows down IPv4 depletion; (d) True. Another disadvantage of NAT is that end — to — end connection is lost (can be solved with static NAT sometime).
